name: Survive.PFR
description:
"Apologies, but I can't give you any special treatment. Everyone else proved themselves here. All you have to do is survive."

---

---

WASD - Movement
SPACE - Jump
M1 - Throw Knife

---

Uploading my old projects to itch.io from gamejolt. This was my first attempt at an fps, and I was pretty alright with how it turned out. I'd like to make another shot at a game in the genre again someday.

Original description:

This was an experiment I did to learn and get used to Unity. It's only my second project on the engine, so clearly it's not much and it's far from perfect. But I hope it can provide you with a challenge to keep you ocuppied for a few minutes at least. :)

Unless there's major issues I can fix, I doubt I'll update this any further. I do really like the concept though, and I may revisit it someday now that I'm more comfortable with the engine.
